name: pnp-list-formatting-product-catalog
title: Product Catalog Sample
shortDescription: The product catalog sample demonstrates how to use view formatting to format lists and display views of the lists inside web parts. It also demonstrates how to create links to download documents from the SharePoint Document libraries.
longDescription: The product catalog sample demonstrates how to use view formatting to format lists and display views of the lists inside web parts. It also demonstrates how to create links to download documents from the SharePoint Document libraries.

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
